scripts.all: rm -rf output && npm run chapters && npm run books && npm run github
scripts.chapters: rm -rf output/html output/pdf && node bin/html.js && node bin/highlight.js && node bin/pdfify.js
scripts.github: rm -rf readme.md && npm run html:h && node bin/github.js
scripts.epub: npm run mdx && rm -rf output/tsmin.epub && pandoc -S -o output/tsminified.epub book.txt output/mdx/**/*.md --highlight-style haddock --epub-cover-image=cover.png --epub-stylesheet=book.epub.css --toc-depth=5
scripts.mobi: rm -rf output/tsminified.mobi && npm run epub && kindlegen output/tsminified.epub -c0 -o tsminified.mobi
scripts.pdf: rm -rf output/tsminified.pdf && npm run mdx && pandoc -N --template=template.tex --variable mainfont="Palatino" --variable sansfont="Century Gothic" --variable monofont="Consolas" --variable fontsize=12pt --variable version='1.0.0' book.txt output/mdx/**/*.md --latex-engine=xelatex --toc --toc-depth=5 -o output/tsminified.pdf
scripts.html:hp: rm -rf output/tsminified-pan.html &&  npm run mdx && pandoc book.txt output/mdx/**/*.md -s -t html -o output/tsminified-pan.html --toc  --toc-depth=5 --template="template.html" --section-divs
scripts.html:h: rm -rf output/tsminified.html && mkdir -p output && pandoc book.txt chapters/**/*.md -s -o output/tsminified.html --toc --toc-depth=5 --template="template.html" --section-divs && node bin/hjs.js
scripts.md: rm -rf output/tsminified.md && pandoc book.txt chapters/**/*.md -o output/tsminified.md
scripts.books: npm run clean:books && npm run html:hp && npm run html:h && npm run pdf && npm run md && npm run epub && npm run mobi
scripts.clean:books: rm -rf output/tsminified.epub tsminified.mobi tsminified.pdf tsminified.html tsminified.md
